problems.title: Build a Todo App #1
problems.description: Create a todo application with features to add, delete, and mark tasks as complete.

problems.title: Infinite Scrolling List #2
problems.description: Implement a list with infinite scrolling and lazy loading of items.

problems.title: Debounced Search Bar #3
problems.description: Build a search bar that fetches results with debouncing to reduce API calls.

problems.description: Implement a Kanban board with draggable tasks using HTML5 drag and drop.
